1557808432_17bfQv5PQW9FZ4akChr7ECfqP2SKu.body: I am a new user of zeronet, the idea is great,but I can't see the possibility of spreading out.There should be more users to play or this pool will be dry.

1552558114_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRF.body: Someone like John(the movie of the man from earth) may exist!

1557817641_1KDopZdzm9GLunEmGTZzdhfHBauzz.body: 20000 meters high, 2.2 mach fast. It is said the noise  and fuel consuming nearly reach the ordinary plane standard.

1558612556_19BG5iU2A8Yyy5CVN2TMvVZPy9c5N.body: I am beginning too, I don't know the zeronet answer yet. But i know another p2p solution.  Here it is http://www.ipfs.guide   Input the movie hash, and you got it.Example: Movie YOUTH , its hash QmYVri7jyBdPyfR8AgBLTgyTjiJifCgpeHFiFrKxowQeq8

1559024997_1KDopZdzm9GLunEmGTZzdhfHBauzz.body: i am afraid that if the trade war last long,the dilemma would result in more intense conflict.Either side or both may want to end this with real war.
